column4: Hello, i get this when trying to run make menuconfig in the kernel source tree, You must install ncurses-devel in order to run make menuconfig. But theres no such package ncurses-devel. I searched for ncurses packages installed, and there was quite a bunch. Plain Ubuntu 5.04 install.
yeah it was there thanks, i can use that when i compile the new kernel ?
i'm not sure -- i think there's a kernel build howto on the wiki
